# init(_:x:y:width:height:stacking:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Swift Charts ](/documentation/charts)

- [ BarPlot ](/documentation/charts/barplot)

- [ init(_:x:y:width:height:stacking:) ](/documentation/Charts/BarPlot/init(_:x:y:width:height:stacking:))

- [ BarPlot ](/documentation/charts/barplot)

-  init(_:x:y:width:height:stacking:) 

Initializer# init(_:x:y:width:height:stacking:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
nonisolated
init<Data>(
    _ data: Data,
    x: PlottableProjection<BarPlot<Content>.DataElement, some Plottable>,
    y: PlottableProjection<BarPlot<Content>.DataElement, some Plottable>,
    width: MarkDimensions<BarPlot<Content>.DataElement> = .automatic,
    height: MarkDimensions<BarPlot<Content>.DataElement> = .automatic,
    stacking: MarkStackingMethod = .standard
) where Content == VectorizedBarPlotContent<Data>, Data : RandomAccessCollection
```
